author: charfdorn
title: Not a bad deal
review: I got this set for a dollar at the LEGO outlet. It's not a terrible deal, especially with all the stylized curved slopes and such that you get. There was also a blue one, which I like a little better. Actually, I would love to see more of these polybagged mini-sets. It seems TLG is heading away from them. No more holiday minis, and the Creator minis are really just an attempt to liquidate all those extra Mr. Magorium's Big Books, I think.

author: andy0002
title: what happened to the minifigure??
review:
up until now minifigures have been driving racers cars. now their not. i liked it alot better back then because they were goofy and funny and looked more like go-carts. now they seem to be more serious and more of a RACE CAR and not a lego RACER. when racers first appeared they had funny little drivers. now theyre hot rod race cars. 

i found this at WALMART in AMERICA, brickset, so no i didnt go to the netherlands and happen to be buying bread and pick this up.... might want to fix that?

anyway, this was a decent set and had a nice design. pretty sturdy and didnt have stickers, i dont think. only problem was that there was no figure.
